lecture.speech: OK, let's challenge Filling in Blank Making Music!
In Filling in Blank Making Music, There are some blue clear boxes are prepared not only white clear notes which we saw in Tracing Making Music.
Now, I can write the notes in the boxes as well.
Yes. In Filling in Blank Making Music, you should just write one more note in the blue boxes.
And, you can write as many notes as you like.
Yeah! I'll write a lot of notes!
Wait, you should consider about relations among the other notes, and make the music while thinking about what kind of note is suitable the position.
Yes... I think it's fun and we can make music more beautifully!
That's right!　Let's try the Filling in Blank Making Music!
